                                                                      Hex-Dump Conversion



Abortion Clinic Bombings

Q.     Although the recent bombing scare here in Washington was unrelated, there have
been a series of recent abortion clinic bombings -- one in Tulsa and one in Atlanta. Does
the Administration believe this is an orchestrated effort and are you doing anything to
provide additional security at these facilities?

        I am not going to comment upon the individual facts in an on-going investigation. But
let me state clearly what I have said on a few occasions over the last couple of weeks. Acts of
violence against people who are trying to exercise their constitutional rights are acts of terror.
They are illegal. They are wrong. And we will investigate them and catch those who are
committing them -- and we will insure that they are punished.

       In May 1994, I proudly signed into law the Freedom of Access to Clinic Entrances Act
(F ACE), and my Administration has moved aggressively to enforce this law and combat this
form of violence.
